players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob, he's the mafia. Vote him to stop the killings."
Diana: "Charlie, thanks. Alice was killed, so Bob must be the mafia. Vote him."
You: "I suspect Charlie. He's the real mafia. Vote him."
Diana: "Bob is mafia; Charlie's claim that Bob is mafia is correct; Bob's accusation of Charlie is false. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, you are the mafia. Your accusation of me is false. Vote me out."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob, he's the mafia. Vote him to stop the killings."
Diana: "Charlie, thanks. Alice was killed, so Bob must be the mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "I suspect Charlie. He's the real mafia. Vote him."
Diana: "Bob is mafia; Charlie's claim that Bob is mafia is correct; Bob's accusation of Charlie is false. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob, you are the mafia. Your accusation of me is false. Vote me out."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
